channel.title: Few things i need help with thanks [718]
channel.description:
I got 7 things I need help with on matrix 718 I'm new to coding 718 so don't hate first how would I add dialogue to an Npc? second how do I make an Npc give the player an item only for Donators third how do I make a ring give bonus Exp while wielding it but it only works in the Donator zone fourth how do I change the speed of when cutting a magic tree the logs give you them faster How would I add Grand Exchange to the source there isn't one already there And how can I add a working 100% money pouch how would I make a teleport need donator only to teleport there? iv made the command just don't know how to make it req donator the rights is = 0 atm
I will rep/thank if you can help me with one or all of these I don't expect all my questions to be answered at least I have done a few of them that fine

item.title: Few things i need help with thanks [718]
item.dc:creator: @InfusedScape InfusedScape
item.description:
@InfusedScape wrote:

Oh jesus. That is a big list. The first few things you can just search around the files for and find an existing one. The GE…um try to look for a source that already has it because I do not think people will code a fully GE for free. If all else fails ditch those ugly 667+ servers and go lower.

Read full topic
item.source: Few things i need help with thanks [718]

item.title: Few things i need help with thanks [718]
item.dc:creator: @swiftclanhype swiftclanhype
item.description:
@swiftclanhype wrote:

I got 7 things I need help with on matrix 718 I’m new to coding 718 so don’t hate
first how would I add dialogue to an Npc?
second how do I make an Npc give the player an item only for Donators
third how do I make a ring give bonus Exp while wielding it but it only works in the Donator zone
fourth how do I change the speed of when cutting a magic tree the logs give you them faster
How would I add Grand Exchange to the source there isn’t one already there
And how can I add a working 100% money pouch
how would I make a teleport need donator only to teleport there? iv made the command just don’t know how to make it req donator the rights is = 0 atm

I will rep/thank if you can help me with one or all of these I don’t expect all my questions to be answered at least I have done a few of them that fine

Read full topic
